question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding CITES?
1) CITES - The Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora.
2) It entered into force in 1985.
3) Currently, 176 countries are Parties to CITES.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: CITES refers to The Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora. it came into force in 1975 and Currently, there are 176 countries, who are Parties to CITES.
